thread.title: Top Spring International Says Chen Feng Yan Resigned As Executive Director And One Of Co-CEOs

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Top Spring International Says Chen Feng Yan Resigned As Executive Director And One Of Co-CEOs

organizations.name: reuters) - top spring international holdings ltd

text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Top Spring International Holdings Ltd :
* CHEN FENG YAN RESIGNED AS EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND ONE OF CO-CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICERS
* ‍WANG TIAN YE RESIGNED AS AN EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR​ * WONG CHUN HONG, CHAIRMAN OF BOARD & AN EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, HAS REMAINED AS SOLE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER Source text for Eikon:
